QuestData.Title: Ice Delivery
QuestData.Description: Alright, one high-quality, pure grade Instant Ice Block!$B$BI tried selling these to people for protection for a while. Y'know, like that trick you see mages pull? Couldn't figure out the whole "breathing" thing, though.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Instant Ice Block to Seril Scourgebane in Everlook.
QuestData.RewardText: Perfect. Now you'll see what really matters in a weapon... finesse.
